description:
Window replacement & boiler renewals. 

PLEASE NOTE AMENDED ADDRESS AND PROPOSAL
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved further details of the windows to flat at No. 32 Lenton Terrace  showing appropriate modifications to disability standards shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to commencement of works on that flat.
The installation of the windows on the estate shall run concurrently with that of flat No. 32 Lenton Terrace

REASON: In order that the local planning authority may be satisfied that the requirements of people with disabilities have been adequately addressed and in the interest of residential amenity.
